Class MainPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • View.MainPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MainPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    Classe MainPanel Classe permettant d'instancier le panel principal, qui contiendra tout les composants necessaires à l'application
    Author:
    antonin, verkyndt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
